Set.Text: [ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Hussite Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Messianic Mysteries, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain a [ICON_Policy] Military Policy slot in any [ICON_Government] Government.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting City-States.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Cathar Christianity, Olympianism, Mesianic Mysteries, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_VisTopSecret] Diplomatic Visibility level with all known Civilizations.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain a [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spy and +1 [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spy capacity at the [ICON_Science] Castles Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All Spies start as Agents with 1 [ICON_Promotion] Promotion.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Pesedjet / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Miaphysite Christianity, Sunni Islam, Olympiansim, Titanism, Isis Mysteries.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Sending a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to another player increases [ICON_Tourism] Tourism against that player by 25%.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes grant +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes sent to the player from other Civilizations earn +2 [ICON_Food] Food for them and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for the player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes sent to [ICON_Alliance] Allies increase [ICON_Alliance] Alliance Points by +100%.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Vaishnaivist Dharman / Alternate Religions: Nestorian Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Sunni Islam, Smartist Dharman, Sikhism, Jainism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+10 [ICON_Faith] Faith from every known Civilization that has founded a [ICON_Religion] Religion, so long as they are not at war with the player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Enemies at war with the player receive +100% [ICON_Razed] War Weariness from fighting against the player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes earn +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes earn +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +2 [ICON_Food] Food.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Anunnaism / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Karaite Judaism, Great Church Christianity, Apostolic-Catholic Christianity, Nestorian Christianity, Sunni Islam, Shia Islam, Zoroastrian Mazdanism, Messianic Mazdanism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]May declare war on any Civilization at war with an [ICON_Alliance] Ally without [ICON_Grievance] Penalties.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Alliance] Allied Civilizations and their [ICON_Unit] Units share [ICON_Pillaged] Pillage rewards and experience if within 5 tiles of the player's [ICON_Unit] Units, and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against a common enemy player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Bonus [ICON_Alliance] Alliance Points when both Civilizations are at war with a common enemy.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Olympianism / Alternate Religions: Orthodox Christianity, Orphism, Titanism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Earn [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 50% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength per [ICON_Policy] Military Policy slot in the player's [ICON_Government] Government.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Chalcedonian Christianity, Orthodox Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Aesirism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Naval Melee Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Naval Melee Units can perform [ICON_Pillaged] Coastal Raids.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Pillaged] Pillaging and Coastal Raiding earns bonus [ICON_Science] Science from [ICON_Charges] Mines; bonus [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_Charges] Quarries, Pastures, Plantations, and Camps.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Viking Longship unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Sailing Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Zen Buddhism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Mahayana Buddhism, Confucian Ruism, Shinto, Tengrikyo.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Units adjacent to [ICON_Terrain] Coast and [ICON_Unit] Naval Units adjacent on [ICON_Terrain] Coastal Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] Encampment, [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square, and [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site [ICON_District] Districts are built 50% faster.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Hurricanes do not [ICON_Damaged] Damage [ICON_District] Districts, [ICON_Charges] Improvements, or [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Enemies suffer +100% [ICON_Damaged] Damage from Hurricanes while at war in the player's home territory.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Jinzambism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot recruit [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophets.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the effects of Founder and Enhancer Beliefs of the majority [ICON_Religion] Religion present in the player's Civilization.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Building a [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Mbanza or [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square creates an Apostle of the City's majority [ICON_Religion] Religion.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Evangelical Christianity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Recruiting or Patronizing a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person returns 20% of [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point cost.
[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Olympianism / Alternate Religions: Orthodox Christinianity, Orphism, Titanism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5% [ICON_Culture] Culture per City-State Suzerainty.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Orthodox Christianity / Alternate Religions: Lutheran Christianity, Bogomolist Christianity, Rodnovery.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to other players gain +1 [ICON_Science] Science or [ICON_Culture] Culture for every three [ICON_Science] Techs or [ICON_Culture] Civics ahead they are.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Cathar Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Mariism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Civilizations following a different [ICON_Religion] Religion than the player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards the [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site and it's [ICON_Buildings] Buildings; bonus doubled for Cities on a [ICON_Terrain] Continent different from the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Religion] Inquisitors have +1 Spread and remove 100% of the pressure of other [ICON_Religion] Religions.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Orthodox Taoism / Alternate Religions: Nestorian Christianity, Sunni Islam, Mahayana Buddhism, Confucian Ruism, Wuism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Charges] Builder Charges.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can spend [ICON_Charges] Builder Charges to gain 15% [ICON_Production] Production of a [ICON_Science] Ancient or Classical Era [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonder's cost.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can build [ICON_DISTRICT_CANAL] Canals at the [ICON_Science] Masonry Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Sunni Islam / Alternate Religions: Shia Islam, Wahhabi Islam, Salafi Islam.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Buildings] Worship Building of the player's [ICON_Religion] Religion has a 90% [ICON_Faith] Faith discount.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The player's Cities with the [ICON_Religion] Worship Buildings gain +10% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 20% of a [ICON_Unit] Military Unit's [ICON_Production] Production cost when produced.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Tabithian / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Great Church Christianity, Zoroastrian Mazdanism, Khurmazdanism Olympianism, Orphism, Tengriism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Military Units or [ICON_Religion] Religious Units attacking [ICON_Damaged] Damaged [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Killing enemy [ICON_Unit] Units heals the attacking [ICON_Unit] Unit +30 Health.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Imperial Mysteries / Alternate Religions: Great Church Christianity, Olympianism, Mithraism, Druidism, Isis Mysteries, Messianic Mysteries.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities start with the cheapest [ICON_Buildings] Building in the [ICON_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER] City Center.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Evangelical Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Anabaptist Christianity, Peyotist Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for all [ICON_Unit] Military Units on the player's home [ICON_Terrain] Continent.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Appeal in Cities with a National Park.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the Rough Rider unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Rifling Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Anglicanism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity, Insular Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The first City founded on each [ICON_Terrain] Continent different than the [ICON_Capital] Capital's Continent grants a free [ICON_Unit] Melee class Unit and +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Building the [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Royal Navy Dockyard grants the strongest available [ICON_Unit] Naval Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Redcoat unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Military Science Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Teotlism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Improved [ICON_Charges] Luxury Resources provide an [ICON_Amenities] Amenity to 2 more Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and [ICON_Religion] Religion Strength for [ICON_Unit] Military Units and [ICON_Religion] Religious Units from each unique [ICON_Charges] Luxury Resource improved in home territory or granted by a [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant (trading for [ICON_Charges] Luxury Resources or gaining Luxury resources from City-States does not grant [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength or [ICON_Religion] Religious Strength).

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Othodox Christianity, Hussite Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Rodnovery, Romuva.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Majority [ICON_Religion] Religion becomes majority in Cities that lose a tile to the player's [ICON_Culture] Culture Bomb.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District_HolySite] Holy Sites gain [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency from adjacent [ICON_District] Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Culture] Culture, as well as +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Othodox Christianity, Hussite Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Rodnovery, Romuva.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Majority [ICON_Religion] Religion becomes majority in Cities that lose a tile to a [ICON_Culture] Culture Bomb.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District_HolySite] Holy Sites gain [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency from adjacent [ICON_District] Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Culture] Culture, as well as +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Insular Christianity, Anglican Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism, Dreamtime.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production in all Cities for the next 10 turns after being declared war upon or liberating a City.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Pesedjet / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Great Church Christianity, Miaphysite Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Sunni Islam, Shia Islam, Atenism, Ka'abaism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+20% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_District] Districts; bonus doubled if there is a [ICON_Charges] Nubian Pyramid adjacent to the [ICON_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER] City Center.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Olympianism / Alternate Religions: Orthodox Christianity, Zoroastrian Mazdanism, Orphism, Pesedjet.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities never incur [ICON_Razed] War Weariness.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All [ICON_Unit] Military Units heal +100 Health when a City with a [ICON_District_Wonder] Wonder is captured.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Hetairoi unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Horseback Riding Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Zoroastrian Mazdanism / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Nestorian Christianity, Shia Islam, Ismaili Islam, Twelver Islam, Zurvanism, Mahayana Buddhism, Anunnaism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all [ICON_Unit] Units for the next 10 turns after declaring a Surprise War.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Declaring a Surprise War generates as much [ICON_Grievance] Grievances and [ICON_Razed] War Weariness as declaring a Formal War.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Occupied] Occupied Cities have no yield penalties.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty per turn in [ICON_Occupied] Occupied Cities with a [ICON_Fortified] Garrisoned Military Unit.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Vaishnaivist Dharman / Alternate Religions: Sunni Islam, Shia Islam, Theraveda Buddhism, Mahayana Buddhism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]May purchase [ICON_Unit] Naval Units with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Religion] Religious Units ignore [ICON_Movement] Movement cost to embark or disembark.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities adjacent to [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake tiles gain +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Theraveda Buddhism / Alternate Religions: Sunni Islam, Mahayana Buddhism, Vaishnavist Dharman, Smartist Dharman.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Sites gain +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Housing] Housing if built next to a [ICON_Terrain] River; and [ICON_Food] Food equal to the [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Sites trigger a [ICON_Culture] Culture Bomb.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Jainism / Alternate Religions: Vedic Dharman, Vaishnaivist Dharman, Shaivist Dharman, Smartist Dharman, Zoroastrian Mazdanism, Olympianism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can declare a War of Territorial Expansion at the [ICON_Culture] Miltary Training Civics.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for all [ICON_Unit] Units for the next 10 turns after declaring a War of Territorial Expansion.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Tengriism / Alternate Religions: Nestorian Christianity, Sunni Islam, Vajrayana Buddhism, Orthodox Taoism, Turumism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Cavalry Units gain +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and have a chance to capture killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Light and Heavy Cavalry class Units.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Machiism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity, Intiism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Free Cities or players in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age or [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE] Heroic Age.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Killing enemy [ICON_Unit] Units decreases [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty by 20 if within enemy City borders; bonus doubled if the enemy player is in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age or [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE] Heroic Age.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Manitouism / Alternate Religions: Peyotist Christianity, Wakan Tankaism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All [ICON_Alliance] Alliance types provide shared [ICON_VisTopSecret] Sight.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food in origin City and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold in the destination City per [ICON_Charges] Camp and Pasture at the destination City.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Insular Christianity, Anglican Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism, Druidism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can declare a War of Liberation at the [ICON_Culture] Defensive Tactics Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production in all Cities and +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all [ICON_Unit] Units for the next 10 turns after declaring a War of Liberation.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Mahayana Buddhism / Alternate Religions: Evangelical Christianity, Confucian Ruism, Muism, Shinto.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities with an established [ICON_Governor] Governor gain +5% [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Faith] Faith per [ICON_Governor] Governor Title.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Unkulunkulism / Alternate Religions: Anglican Christianity, Evangelical Christianity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Military [ICON_Corps] Corps can be formed at the [ICON_Culture] Mercenaries Civic; Military [ICON_Army] Armies can be formed at the [ICON_Culture] Nationalism Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Military [ICON_Corps] Corps and [ICON_Army] Armies gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Orthodox Christianity / Alternate Religions: Apostolic Christianity, Bogomolist Christianity, Paulican Christianity, Ghmertism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Earn [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 50% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength; bonus increased to 100% if combat was within 7 tiles of a [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, as well as +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith in each level of [ICON_Buildings] City Walls.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Each [ICON_Envoy] Envoy sent to a City-State of the player's majority [ICON_Religion] Religion counts as two [ICON_Envoy] Envoys.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain +3 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith from City-State Suzerainty.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Lutheran Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Anabaptist Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes earn +2 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty per turn for the origin City; international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to and from the player grant +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture to the player.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Ba'alism / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Monothelite Christianity, Sunni Islam, Olympianism, Anunnaism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities with a [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Cothon gain the unique Move Capital Project.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity from the [ICON_DISTRICT_GOVERNMENT] Government Plaza and it's [ICON_Buildings] Buildings.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_District] Districts in the City with the [ICON_DISTRICT_GOVERNMENT] Government Plaza.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Insular Christianity, Anglican Christianity, Cathar Christianity, Messianic Mysteries, Aesirism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Works lower [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty by 1 in foreign Cities that are 9 tiles away.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Any City that turns to a Free City joins the player immediately if the player exerts the highest [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty Pressure.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Buildings] Angevin Port unique Building.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Orthodox Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Aesirism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Buildings] Buildings or [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonders with at least 3 [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Work slots are automatically [ICON_ThemeBonus_Active] Themed when filled.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can build the [ICON_Buildings] Queen's Bibliotheque unique Building in the [ICON_DISTRICT_GOVERNMENT] Government Plaza.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Manaism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity, Anglican Christianity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Spawns on [ICON_Terrain] Ocean tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn before founding the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The [ICON_Capital] Capital begins with +1 [ICON_Citizen] Population, [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, as well as +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Insular Christianity, Anglican Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Anabaptist Christianity, Peyotist Christianity, Manitouism, Aesirism, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can build [ICON_Charges] Farms on [ICON_Terrain] Tundra tiles; can build on [ICON_Terrain] Tundra Hills at the [ICON_Culture] Civil Engineering Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All [ICON_Terrain] Tundra and Snow tiles have a 50% [ICON_Gold] Gold purchase discount.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Accumulate +100% [ICON_Resource_Iron] Strategic Resources on [ICON_Terrain] Tundra and Snow tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Terrain] Tundra and Snow [ICON_Charges] Mines and Lumber Mills gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Terrain] Tundra [ICON_Charges] Farms and Camps gain +2 [ICON_Food] Food.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Sunni Islam / Alternate Religions: Shia Islam, Quranist Islam, Ammonism, Voodun, Akomism, Boriism, Sererism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every flat [ICON_Terrain] Desert tile in the origin City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Entering a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age or [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE] Heroic Age permanently grants +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Intiism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity, Machiism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trades Routes gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food for every [ICON_Terrain] Mountain tile in the origin City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Charges] Qhapaq Ñan unique Improvement at the [ICON_Culture] Foreign Trade Civic.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Neolog Judaism, Orthodox Christianity, Hussite Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Istenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Levied City-State [ICON_Unit] Units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, and can be upgraded at a 75% [ICON_Gold] Gold and Resource discount.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Levying [ICON_Unit] Units from a City-State grants +1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy with that City-State.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Black Army unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Castles Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Sunni Islam / Alternate Religions: Alevi Islam, Shia Islam, Tengriism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Has access to a unique [ICON_Governor] Governor: the Grand Vizier.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain 1 [ICON_Governor] Governor title at the [ICON_Science] Gunpowder Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Janissary unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Gunpowder Technology.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Popol Vuh / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Non-Capital Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +20% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities beyond 9 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital suffer -50% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities founded within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital spawn a [ICON_Charges] Builder.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Mariism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Entering a new Era grants a [ICON_GreatPerson] Commandante General.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Miaphysite Christianity / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Sunni Islam, Monophysite Christianity, Apostolic Christianity, Maherism, Waaqism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities on [ICON_Terrain] Hills gain [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 15% of the City's [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Military Units on [ICON_Terrain] Hills gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Chalcedonian Christianity / Alternate Religions: Orthodox Christianity, Bogomolist Christianity, Imperial Mysteries, Pesedjet, Ba'alism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Heavy and Light Cavalry Units deal full [ICON_Damaged] Damage to Cities following the same [ICON_Religion] Religion as the player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold on [ICON_Charges] Farms.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Tagma unique Unit at the [ICON_Culture] Divine Right Civic.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Druidism / Alternate Religions: Insular Christianity, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 20% of a [ICON_Unit] Military Unit's [ICON_Production] Production cost when produced.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Melee, Anti-Cavalry, and Ranged Units gain +1 [ICON_strength] Combat Strength per adjacent [ICON_Unit] Military Unit.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Anunnaism / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Karaite Judaism, Great Church Christianity, Apostolic Catholic Christianity, Sunni Islam, Shia Islam, Ba'alism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The first time building a type of [ICON_District] Specialty District builds the cheapest [ICON_Buildings] Building available within that [ICON_District] District.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Receive a [ICON_Envoy] Envoy from building the first type of [ICON_District] Non-Specialty District.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Mahayana Buddhism / Alternate Religions: Catholic Christianity, Evangelical Christianity, Theravada Buddhism, Orthodox Taoism, Confucian Ruism, Caodaism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All [ICON_Unit] Military Units gain +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement when starting the turn on, as well as +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when on [ICON_Terrain] Woods, Rainforest, and Marsh; bonus doubled if the player owns the tile.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Vajrayana Buddhism / Alternate Religions: Nestorian Christianity, Sunni Islam, Mahayana Buddhism, Orthodox Taoism, Confucian Ruism, Tengriism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain a [ICON_Policy] Economic Policy in any [ICON_Government] Government.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Receive a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration when establishing a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in another player's City for the first time.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+10% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Mariism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_VisTopSecret] Sight for all [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity after meeting another player.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Open Borders with all City-States.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Cathar Christianity, Olympianism, Mesianic Mysteries, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_VisTopSecret] Diplomatic Visibility level with all known Civilizations.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain a Spy and +1 Spy capacity at the [ICON_Science] Castles Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All Spies start as Agents with 1 [ICON_Promotion] Promotion.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Cathar Christianity, Olympianism, Mesianic Mysteries, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture on [ICON_Charges] Improved Luxury Resources adjacent to a [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square or [ICON_Charges] Château.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Squares gain the unique Court Festival Project.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Evangelical Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Anabaptist Christianity, Peyotist Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Breathtaking tiles gain +2 [ICON_Science] Science when adjacent to a [ICON_Terrain] Natural Wonder or Mountain, and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture when adjacent to a [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonder or [ICON_Terrain] Woods.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Appeal in Cities with a [ICON_Charges] National Park.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Evangelical Christianity / Alternate Religions: Calvinist Christianity, Anabaptist Christianity, Peyotist Christianity, Aesirism, Asenism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for all [ICON_Unit] Military Units on the player's home [ICON_Terrain] Continent.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Envoy] Envoys sent to City-States that the player has a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to counts as 2 [ICON_Envoy] Envoys.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain the [ICON_Unit] Rough Rider Unique Unit at the [ICON_Science] Rifling Technology.

Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Anunnaism / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Karaite Judaism, Great Church Christianity, Nestorian Christianity, Sunni Islam, Shia Islam, Zoroastrian Mazdanism, Messianic Mazdanism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Production] Production when claiming [ICON_GreatPerson] Heroes.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Heroes gain +20% [ICON_Lifespan] Lifespan.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Othodox Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Rodnovery, Romuva.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Majority [ICON_Religion] Religion becomes majority in Cities that lose a tile to the player's [ICON_Culture] Culture Bomb.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District_HolySite] Holy Sites gain [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency from adjacent [ICON_District] Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Culture] Culture, as well as +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics and [ICON_GreatWork_HeroRelic] Heroic Relics.
